content: repeat 24 times 2 double_crochet in the back loop fptc around the previous fpdc from round #9 2 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the next fpdc from round #9 round #11 it s time for a puff video https //www youtube com/watch v=nbnak9gyswc repeat 24 times 2 double_crochet in the back loop puff around the fptc 2 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc around fpdc round #12 this will be an easy round repeat 24 times 5 double_crochet in the back loop the middle one will be made in the back loop of a puff 1 fpdc around the fpdc round #13 repeat 24 times 3 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fptc around the next fpdc 2 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the same fpdc magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #14 repeat 24 times skip the first double_crochet behind the fpdc 2 double_crochet in the back loop puff around the fptc 2 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the fpdc round #15 repeat 24 times 5 double_crochet in the back loop the middle one will be made in the back loop of a puff 1 fpdc around the fpdc round #16 repeat 24 times 2 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fptc around the previous fpdc of round #15 3 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the next fpdc of round #15 round #17 repeat 24 times 2 double_crochet in the back loop 3 fpdc around the fptc 3 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the next fpdc round #18 repeat 24 times 1 double_crochet in the back loop double_crochet-increase in the back loop fpdc3-decrease 3 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the next fpdc round #19 repeat 24 times 7 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc around fpdc magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #20 repeat 24 times 4 double_crochet in the back loop fpdtc around the next fpdc from round #19 3 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc around the same fpdc from round #19 round #21 repeat 24 times 4 double_crochet in the back loop 3 fpdc around fpdtc 3 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc around fpdc round #22 this will be an easy round every stitch is worked through as it is if you see an ordinary double_crochet make a double_crochet in the back loop if you see a fpdc make a fpdc around it round #23 repeat 24 times 3 double_crochet in the back loop double_crochet-increase in the back loop fpdc3-decrease double_crochet-increase in the back loop 2 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc around fpdc round #24 repeat 24 times 10 double_crochet in the back loop the 6th is made in the fpdc3-decrease fpdc around fpdc this is my carpet after one kilometer of 3 mm string and 6 hours of work magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #25 repeat 24 times 4
